channel.title: Compiling errors
channel.description:
Alright so I just started with a compiler and this is my code for it
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\jav ac.exe" *.java pause
And it always says
The system cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue...
I think this is weird because I alredy set my path and classpath variables.. Any help and a photo of what a succesful compiler code and picture is would be very helpful..
Thanks

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

If it doesn’t have an “error” word in the writing, then it’s all fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Alright thanks a lot man I was wondering why it was never working this whole time but what would it say when it succesfully compiles?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

you didn’t install it right, now use this code:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
If that doesn’t work, then install jdk 21 properly till you see it in the folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Well in the java folder there is not that…?? It’s all jre1.6.0_07 and below… and jre6… What should I do… I just installed jdk 21

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Are you CERTAIN that you have a “jdk1.6.0_21” folder in the “java” folder which is in the “Program Files” folder?
What I’m saying is that do you see anything in this directory?:
C:/Program files/Java
if yes, what’s in it?

EDIT:
try this compiler:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

Ok here are my codes

Variable name : Classpath

Variable code : CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Heres my Path

Variable name : Path

Variable code : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;

And yes I do have jdk 21

I hope somebody can help

Read full topic
